This website accompanies the course **MSCR 596 - Advanced Data Management** at
[Emory University](https://www.emory.edu) that aims to
introduce the [R statistical programming language](https://www.r-project.org/) with a focus on data management
tasks and reproducible statistical analysis.  Learn more in [About](about.html) 
or jump right into the [Exercises](exercises.html).
